description:
Learning about witches and girls western clothing bring about a whole new set of annoyances for Hozuki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est quoi, une petite sorcière ? / Les joies de la mode
Majokko to wa Nanzoya / Yousou Douraku
What Is a Magical Girl? / Indulging in Western Clothing
魔女っ娘とはなんぞや / 洋装道楽
